titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on spring steel.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 6/12/1997--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1999, the duty on L-shaped edges of spring steel for use in the manufacture of skis and snowboards.
